abstract: The final destination `URL` for the exported scene file.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this option if you export a scene to a temporary directory and then move it to a final location. You must specify a final destination URL (an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL] object) if your scene references external resources, such as image files for textures. SceneKit uses this URL to construct appropriate paths for external resources when writing the scene file.

# SCNSceneExportDestinationURL

**Global Variable**

The final destination `URL` for the exported scene file.

## Declaration

```swift
let SCNSceneExportDestinationURL: String
```

## Discussion

Use this option if you export a scene to a temporary directory and then move it to a final location. You must specify a final destination URL (an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL] object) if your scene references external resources, such as image files for textures. SceneKit uses this URL to construct appropriate paths for external resources when writing the scene file.
title: SCNSceneExportDestinationURL
